body.ab: <lb n="c57-0117__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0117.02" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 14th<lb n="c57-0117__main__2"/><lb n="c57-0117__left_margin__1"/> I was soon <del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19723__Start"/>int<del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19723__End"/> introduced into the presence of the <lb n="c57-0117__main__3"/> Magistrate; an<del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19728__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19728__End"/> old benevolent man with <lb n="c57-0117__main__4"/> calm & mild manners. He looked <del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19735__Start"/>towards<del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19735__End"/>upon me <lb n="c57-0117__main__5"/> however with some degree of severity, and then <lb n="c57-0117__main__6"/> turning towards my conductors <del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19747__Start"/>wh<del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19747__End"/> he <del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19750__Start"/>h<del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19750__End"/> asked who <lb n="c57-0117__main__7"/><del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19755__Start"/>it was that<del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19755__End"/><del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19758__Start"/>there were who<del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19758__End"/> appeared as wit<lb n="c57-0117__main__8"/>nesses on this occasion<mdel>,</mdel>. about half a dozen <lb n="c57-0117__main__9"/> men came forward and one being selected <lb n="c57-0117__main__10"/> by the magistrate he deposed that he had been <lb n="c57-0117__main__11"/> out fishing the night before with his son &<lb n="c57-0117__main__12"/> his brother-in-law, Daniel Nugent, when <lb n="c57-0117__main__13"/> about nine o clock they observed a strong <lb n="c57-0117__main__14"/> northerly blast rising & they accordingly put <lb n="c57-0117__main__15"/> in for port. It was a very dark night as <lb n="c57-0117__main__16"/> the moon had not yet risen; They did not <lb n="c57-0117__main__17"/> lan<mdel>g</mdel>d at the harbour but, as they had been <lb n="c57-0117__main__18"/> accustomed, at a creek about two miles <lb n="c57-0117__main__19"/> below. He went first carrying a part <lb n="c57-0117__main__20"/> of the fishing tackle & his companions <lb n="c57-0117__main__21"/> followed him at some distance. As he <lb n="c57-0117__main__22"/> was walking along the sands he <del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19823__Start"/>hit<del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19823__End"/>struck his foot <lb n="c57-0117__main__23"/> against somthing & fell all his length on <lb n="c57-0117__main__24"/> the ground; his comrades came up to assist <lb n="c57-0117__main__25"/> him & by the light of their lantern they <lb n="c57-0117__main__26"/> discovered that he had fallen on the <lb n="c57-0117__main__27"/> body of a man who was to all appearance <lb n="c57-0117__main__28"/> dead.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0117__main__29"/> Their first supposition was that <lb n="c57-0117__main__30"/> it was the corpse of <del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19852__Start"/>man<del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19852__End"/>some person who had been <lb n="c57-0117__main__31"/> drowned & thrown on shore by the waves, <lb n="c57-0117__main__32"/> But upon examination they found that <lb n="c57-0117__main__33"/> the clothes were not wet &<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>even that the body <lb n="c57-0117__main__34"/> was not yet cold. They instantly carried <lb n="c57-0117__main__35"/> it to the cottage of an old woman <lb n="c57-0117__main__36"/> near the spot& endeavoured <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>but in vain to restore it to life <del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19895__Start"/>but<del loc="c57-0117__main__d1e19895__End"/><lb n="c57-0118__main__1"/><del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e19903__Start"/>In vain<del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e19903__End"/>. He appeared to have been a handsome <lb n="c57-0118__main__2"/> young man about twenty years of age. He <lb n="c57-0118__main__3"/> had apparently been strangled for there <lb n="c57-0118__main__4"/><lb n="c57-0118__left_margin__1"/>was no sign of any violence except the black <lb n="c57-0118__main__5"/> mark of fingers on his neck.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0118__main__6"/> The first <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>part of this deposition did not <lb n="c57-0118__main__7"/> in the least interrest me but when the <lb n="c57-0118__main__8"/> mark of the fingers was mentioned I remem<lb n="c57-0118__main__9"/>bered the <del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e19946__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e19946__End"/> murder of my brother & felt <lb n="c57-0118__main__10"/> myself extremely agitated; my limbs t<mdel>r</mdel>rembled <lb n="c57-0118__main__11"/>& a mist came over my eyes which obliged <lb n="c57-0118__main__12"/> me to lean on a chair for support; the <lb n="c57-0118__main__13"/> Magistrate observed me with a keen eye <lb n="c57-0118__main__14"/>& of course drew an unfavourable augury f<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>rom <lb n="c57-0118__main__15"/><del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e19984__Start"/>it.<del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e19984__End"/> my manner.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0118__main__16"/> The son confirmed his fathers account <lb n="c57-0118__main__17"/> but when Daniel Nugent was questioned <lb n="c57-0118__main__18"/> he swore positively that just before the <lb n="c57-0118__main__19"/> fall of his companion he saw a boat with <lb n="c57-0118__main__20"/> a single man in it <del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e20002__Start"/>push<del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e20002__End"/><del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e20005__Start"/>about fifty yar<del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e20005__End"/><mdel>ds</mdel>at a short distance<lb n="c57-0118__main__21"/> from the shore & as far as he could judge <lb n="c57-0118__main__22"/> by the light of a few stars it was the same <lb n="c57-0118__main__23"/> boat in which I had just landed.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0118__main__24"/> A woman deposed that she lived near <lb n="c57-0118__main__25"/> the beach & was standing at the door of her <lb n="c57-0118__main__26"/> cottage waiting for the return <del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e20032__Start"/>when<del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e20032__End"/>of the fisherman about <lb n="c57-0118__main__27"/><del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e20043__Start"/>ten minutes<del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e20043__End"/><lb n="c57-0118__left_margin__1"/><del loc="c57-0118__left_margin__d1e20052__Start"/>half a quarter of<del loc="c57-0118__left_margin__d1e20052__End"/><del loc="c57-0118__left_margin__d1e20056__Start"/>half<del loc="c57-0118__left_margin__d1e20056__End"/>an hour before she heard of the dis<lb n="c57-0118__main__28"/>covery of the body she saw a boat with only <lb n="c57-0118__main__29"/> one <del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e20073__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e20073__End"/> man in it push off from that <lb n="c57-0118__main__30"/> part of the shore where the corpse was <lb n="c57-0118__main__31"/> afterwards found.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0118__main__32"/> Another woman confirmed the ac<del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e20087__Start"/>c<del loc="c57-0118__main__d1e20087__End"/><lb n="c57-0118__main__33"/>count of the fisherman having brought the <lb n="c57-0118__main__34"/> bo<mdel>at</mdel>dy into her house.–It was not cold &<lb n="c57-0118__main__35"/> they put <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>it into a bed & rubbed it and Daniel<lb n="c57-0119__main__1"/> went to the town for an appothecary, but <lb n="c57-0119__main__2"/> life was quite gone.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0119__main__3"/> Several other men <del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20130__Start"/>deposed con<del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20130__End"/><lb n="c57-0119__main__4"/> were examined concerning my landing & they <lb n="c57-0119__main__5"/> agreed that with the strong north wind that <lb n="c57-0119__main__6"/> had arrisen during the night it was very <lb n="c57-0119__main__7"/> probable that I had beaten about for <lb n="c57-0119__main__8"/> many hours & have been obliged to return <lb n="c57-0119__main__9"/><lb n="c57-0119__left_margin__1"/>nearly to the same <del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20155__Start"/>place<del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20155__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>spot from which I had <lb n="c57-0119__main__10"/><del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20167__Start"/>set out<del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20167__End"/> departed. Besides, they observed, <lb n="c57-0119__main__11"/> that it appeared I had brought the body <lb n="c57-0119__main__12"/> from another place & it was likely <lb n="c57-0119__main__13"/> that <del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20177__Start"/>I might<del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20177__End"/><del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20180__Start"/>p<del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20180__End"/> as I did not appear to know <lb n="c57-0119__main__14"/> the shore I might have put in to the <lb n="c57-0119__main__15"/> harbour ignorant of the distance <lb n="c57-0119__main__16"/> of the town of —— from the place where <lb n="c57-0119__main__17"/> I had deposited the <del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20193__Start"/>body<del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20193__End"/><del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20195__Start"/>.<del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20195__End"/> corpse.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0119__main__18"/>>Mr. Kirwin on hearing this evidence <lb n="c57-0119__main__19"/> desired that I should be taken into the <lb n="c57-0119__main__20"/> room where the body lay for interment <lb n="c57-0119__main__21"/> that it might be observed what effect <lb n="c57-0119__main__22"/> the sight of it would produce<del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20217__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20217__End"/> upon me. <lb n="c57-0119__main__23"/> This idea was probably suggested by <lb n="c57-0119__main__24"/> the extreme agitation I had exhibited <lb n="c57-0119__main__25"/><del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20226__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20226__End"/> when the mode of the murder had <lb n="c57-0119__main__26"/> been <del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20231__Start"/>describ<del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20231__End"/> described. I was according<lb n="c57-0119__main__27"/>ly conducted by the Magistrate & several <lb n="c57-0119__main__28"/> other persons to the Inn. I could not <lb n="c57-0119__main__29"/> help being struck by the strange coin<lb n="c57-0119__main__30"/>cidences that had taken place during <lb n="c57-0119__main__31"/> this eventful night but knowing that <lb n="c57-0119__main__32"/> I had been <del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20256__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20256__End"/> conversing with several <lb n="c57-0119__main__33"/> persons in the island I had inhabited <lb n="c57-0119__main__34"/> about the time that the body <del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20266__Start"/>was<del loc="c57-0119__main__d1e20266__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>had been found<lb n="c57-0120__main__1"/> I was perfectly tranquil as to the consequences of the <lb n="c57-0120__main__2"/> affair.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0120__main__3"/> I entered the room where the <del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20293__Start"/>body<del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20293__End"/>corpse lay <lb n="c57-0120__main__4"/>& was led up to the coffin. How can I describle?<lb n="c57-0120__main__5"/> my sensation. I feel yet parched with horror <lb n="c57-0120__main__6"/> nor can I ever reflect on that terrible <lb n="c57-0120__main__7"/> moment without shuddering & agony that <lb n="c57-0120__main__8"/>faintly reminds of the anguish of <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>therecogni<lb n="c57-0120__main__9"/>tion. The trial, the presence of the <lb n="c57-0120__main__10"/> magistrate & witnesses passed like a <lb n="c57-0120__main__11"/> dream from my memory when I saw <lb n="c57-0120__main__12"/> the lifeless form of Henry Cl<mdel>ai</mdel><metamark>^</metamark>erval <lb n="c57-0120__main__13"/> stretched before me – I gasped for breath <lb n="c57-0120__main__14"/>& throwing myself on the body I exclaim<lb n="c57-0120__main__15"/>ed. And have my murderous machi<lb n="c57-0120__main__16"/>nations deprived you <del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20377__Start"/>alls<del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20377__End"/> also my <lb n="c57-0120__main__17"/> dearest Henry of life— Two <del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20382__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20382__End"/><del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20385__Start"/>victims<del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20385__End"/><lb n="c57-0120__main__18"/> I have already destroyed; other victims <lb n="c57-0120__main__19"/> await their destinny – But you, Cl<mdel>ai</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>erval, <lb n="c57-0120__main__20"/> my frend, my benefactor!—<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0120__main__21"/> The human frame could no longer <lb n="c57-0120__main__22"/> support the agonizing suffering that I <lb n="c57-0120__main__23"/> endured & I was carried out of the room <lb n="c57-0120__main__24"/> in strong convulsions.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0120__main__25"/> A fever succeeded to this. I lay for two <lb n="c57-0120__main__26"/> months on the point of death. My ravings, <lb n="c57-0120__main__27"/> as I afterwards heard were frightful. I called <lb n="c57-0120__main__28"/> myself the murderer of William <del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20440__Start"/>of<del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20440__End"/>Jus Wil <lb n="c57-0120__main__29"/> liam, <del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20450__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20450__End"/> of Justine & of <del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20453__Start"/>Cl<del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20453__End"/> Cl<mdel>ai</mdel><metamark place="sublinear">^</metamark>erval. Sometimes <lb n="c57-0120__main__30"/> I entreated my attendants to assist me in <lb n="c57-0120__main__31"/> the destruction of the fiend by whom <lb n="c57-0120__main__32"/> I was tormented – and at others I felt the <lb n="c57-0120__main__33"/><del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20480__Start"/>fangs<del loc="c57-0120__main__d1e20480__End"/><lb n="c57-0120__left_margin__1"/>fingers of the mosnster already grasping my<lb n="c57-0121__main__1"/> neck & screamed aloud with agony & terror. <lb n="c57-0121__main__2"/> Fortunately as I spoke my native tongue <lb n="c57-0121__main__3"/> Mr. Kirwin alone understood <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>me. But my gestures <lb n="c57-0121__main__4"/> and bitter cries were sufficient, to affright <lb n="c57-0121__main__5"/> the other witnesses.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0121__main__6"/> Why did I not die? More miserable <lb n="c57-0121__main__7"/> than man ever was before why did I <lb n="c57-0121__main__8"/> not sink into rest & forgetfullness? Death <lb n="c57-0121__main__9"/> snatches away many blooming children the <lb n="c57-0121__main__10"/><del loc="c57-0121__main__d1e20538__Start"/>oly<del loc="c57-0121__main__d1e20538__End"/> only hopes of their doating <del loc="c57-0121__main__d1e20541__Start"/>per<del loc="c57-0121__main__d1e20541__End"/> parents; <lb n="c57-0121__main__11"/> How many brides & youthful lovers have <lb n="c57-0121__main__12"/> been one day in the bloom of health &<lb n="c57-0121__main__13"/> hope & the next a prey for worms & the <lb n="c57-0121__main__14"/> decay of the tomb! Of what materials was I <lb n="c57-0121__main__15"/> made <del loc="c57-0121__main__d1e20555__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0121__main__d1e20555__End"/> that I could thus resist so many <lb n="c57-0121__main__16"/> shocks which like the turning of the wheel <lb n="c57-0121__main__17"/><lb n="c57-0121__left_margin__1"/>continually renewed the torture.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0121__main__18"/> But I was doomed to live & in two <lb n="c57-0121__main__19"/> months found myself <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>as awaking from a <lb n="c57-0121__main__20"/> dream, in a prison, stretched on a wretched <lb n="c57-0121__main__21"/> bed surrounded by gailors–turnkeys, bolts <lb n="c57-0121__main__22"/>& all the miserable apparatus of a dungeon <lb n="c57-0121__main__23"/> It was morning I remember when I thus awoke <lb n="c57-0121__main__24"/>I had forgotten <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the particulars of what had happened & only <lb n="c57-0121__main__25"/> felt as if some great misery had over<lb n="c57-0121__main__26"/>come me. But when I looked around <lb n="c57-0121__main__27"/> and saw the barred windows, & the <lb n="c57-0121__main__28"/> squalidness of the room in which I was, <lb n="c57-0121__main__29"/> all flashed across my memory –& I <lb n="c57-0121__main__30"/> groaned bitterly. This sound disturbed an <lb n="c57-0121__main__31"/> old woman who was sleeping in a <lb n="c57-0121__main__32"/> chair beside me. She was a hired nurse, <lb n="c57-0121__main__33"/> the wife of one of the turnkeys & her <lb n="c57-0121__main__34"/> countenance expressed all those bad qua<lb n="c57-0121__main__35"/>lities which <del loc="c57-0121__main__d1e20650__Start"/>usually<del loc="c57-0121__main__d1e20650__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>often characterize <del loc="c57-0121__main__d1e20661__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0121__main__d1e20661__End"/><lb n="c57-0122__main__1"/> that class. her face was hard & rude like that <lb n="c57-0122__main__2"/> of per<mdel/>sons accustomed to see without sympa<lb n="c57-0122__main__3"/>thizing in sights of misery. <del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20688__Start"/>She spoke with a<del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20688__End"/><lb n="c57-0122__main__4"/><lb n="c57-0122__left_margin__1"/>Her voice <del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20702__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20702__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>expressed her entire indifference – She <lb n="c57-0122__main__5"/> addressed me in Eglish & the words struck <lb n="c57-0122__main__6"/> me as one that I had heard during my suff <lb n="c57-0122__main__7"/> erings– Are you better now, <mdel>s</mdel>Sir, said she.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0122__main__8"/> I replied in the same language <lb n="c57-0122__main__9"/> with a feeble voice; I believe I am but <lb n="c57-0122__main__10"/> if it all be true – if indeed I did not <lb n="c57-0122__main__11"/> dream I am sorry that I am still alive <lb n="c57-0122__main__12"/> to feel misery & horror.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0122__main__13"/> For that matter, replied the old <lb n="c57-0122__main__14"/><del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20754__Start"/>wan<del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20754__End"/> woman, if you mean about <lb n="c57-0122__main__15"/> the gentleman that you murdered I <lb n="c57-0122__main__16"/> believe that it were better for you <lb n="c57-0122__main__17"/> if you were dead – for I fancy it will <lb n="c57-0122__main__18"/> go hard with you, <del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20766__Start"/>but<del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20766__End"/> you will be <lb n="c57-0122__main__19"/> hanged when the next session comes <lb n="c57-0122__main__20"/> on – however that is none of my business <lb n="c57-0122__main__21"/> I am sent <del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20776__Start"/>for<del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20776__End"/> to nurse you & get <lb n="c57-0122__main__22"/> you well–I do <del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20781__Start"/>no more<del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20781__End"/> my duty with <lb n="c57-0122__main__23"/> a safe conscience; it were well if every<lb n="c57-0122__main__24"/>body did the same.–<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0122__main__25"/> I turned <del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20797__Start"/>fro<del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20797__End"/> with lo<del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20800__Start"/>o<del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20800__End"/>athing from <lb n="c57-0122__main__26"/> the woman who could utter so un<lb n="c57-0122__main__27"/>feeling a speech to <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>a<del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20824__Start"/>man<del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20824__End"/>person just saved on <lb n="c57-0122__main__28"/> the very edge of death; but I felt languid <lb n="c57-0122__main__29"/> and unable to reflect on all that had <lb n="c57-0122__main__30"/> passed; <del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20840__Start"/>It sometimes<del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20840__End"/>The whole series of my life appeared as a dream <lb n="c57-0122__main__31"/> I sometimes <del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20849__Start"/>I<del loc="c57-0122__main__d1e20849__End"/> doubted if indeed it was not <lb n="c57-0122__main__32"/> all true but it never presented itself to<lb n="c57-0123__main__1"/> my mind with the face of reality.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0123__main__2"/><del loc="c57-0123__main__d1e20864__Start"/>But<del loc="c57-0123__main__d1e20864__End"/><mdel>a</mdel>As the images that floated <lb n="c57-0123__main__3"/> before me became more distinct I grew <lb n="c57-0123__main__4"/> feverish;
